vote.title: To recognize and designate October 2023 as Crime Prevention Month in Columbus, Ohio.
vote.description:
Title
To recognize and designate October 2023 as Crime Prevention Month in Columbus, Ohio.
 
Body
WHEREAS, National Crime Prevention Month began in 1984 to encourage U.S. residents to take part in their community’s crime prevention efforts; and
 
WHEREAS, preventing crime and de-escalating violence are a critical role of the City of Columbus, our residents, businesses, and civic partners; and
 
WHEREAS, the purpose of National Crime Prevention Month is to address the causes of crime and empower individuals to take action in their communities to prevent crime; and
 
WHEREAS, by focusing on crime prevention, the City of Columbus and its residents can reduce reliance on police and focus more efforts on alternative crisis responses and community response efforts; and
 
WHEREAS, through this resolution, Columbus City Council pledges to work with local, regional, and national partners such as the National Crime Prevention Council to reach these goals; and
 
WHEREAS, with this resolution Council designates October as Crime Prevention Month; and
                     
WHEREAS, an overwhelming majority of 88% of all 2023 homicides in Columbus were committed with firearms and felonious assaults are also up, with 870 as of August 1, 2023, compared to 796 in 2022. The City of Columbus is committed to improve safety one home at a time by offering gun buyback events, giving away free gun cable locks and lock boxes, and focusing this month on crime prevention; and
 
WHEREAS, Columbus, Ohio is committed and invested in crime prevention efforts. The City has passed local gun regulations, held rallies for common sense gun reform, and invested millions of dollars in prevention and intervention programs this year; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize and designate October 2023 as Crime Prevention Month and urges all residents of Columbus to stay alert, report suspicious and dangerous activity, and come together to increase community safety during Crime Prevention Month.
